head.title: Remove Metadata Properties of {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Cross platform {{EnvName}} metadata API to hide and remove metadata fields of {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Remove {{FileFormatUp}} Metadata In {{EnvName}}
header.description: Remove metadata properties from {{FileFormatUp}} and many other popular documents, images and multimedia file formats using {{ProdFullName}} API
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}} API

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced metadata fields manipulation solution to easily read, add, update, delete, find, compare, exchange and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Remove metadata details from Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIp, Audio and Video file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.

formats.title: Removing Metadata Of Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi format documents and images metadata removing API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.

examples.comment_2: Remove all mentions of any people contributed in file creation
examples.comment_3: Remove a custom property with the specified name

steps.title: Steps for Removing Metadata to {{FileFormatUp}} in {{EnvName}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to delete metadata information from {{FileFormatUp}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} file to be updated.
content.step_2: Pass a search predicate to the {{TextRemoveProperties}} method.
content.step_3: Check the number of properties that were actually removed.

more_features.title: Manage Document Metadata with Ease
more_features.description: Our solution simplifies managing your document metadata. Easily access, edit, and update various document properties to keep your files organized and searchable.

feature_1.title: Effortless Metadata Control
feature_1.content: Quickly get and process a document's metadata. Gain valuable insights like author, creation date, and more.

feature_2.title: Simple Metadata Updation
feature_2.content: Directly edit document metadata. Update properties for better organization, searchability, and accurate information.

feature_3.title: Powerful Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Perform advanced operations on document metadata. Easily handle tasks like adding custom properties, removing unnecessary data, and ensuring data consistency.

code_1.title: Clear ZIP archive metadata
